Name: Moonlit
About the game: !UPDATE! 5 different kinds of weapons drops added to the monsters! Slay the enemies to try them all! Moonlit is a living testament that simplicity is never out of style, reminiscing the good old days. In the game, you play as a mysterious girl that must deal with fearful curse, triggered by the full moon. While keeping an old school indie format, you will be able to play through a variety of scenarios, from deserts to haunted ghost-like environment, trying to find out and fight the source of the curse.
Meta Title: Moonlit: Dec 17, 2020, Eduardo Machado and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Moonlit? Check out the release date (Dec 17, 2020), developer insights from Eduardo Machado, and a complete game summary.
